sql.query: INSERT INTO email_templates_default (email_key, can_edit, can_disable, from_role_id, to_role_id) SELECT 'PAYPAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED', can_edit, can_disable, from_role_id, to_role_id FROM email_templates_default WHERE email_key = 'MANUAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED'

INSERT INTO email_templates_default_data (email_key, locale, subject, body, description) SELECT 'PAYPAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED', locale, subject, body, description FROM email_templates_default_data WHERE email_key = 'MANUAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED'
INSERT INTO email_templates (email_key, assoc_id, enabled, assoc_type) SELECT 'PAYPAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED', assoc_id, enabled, assoc_type FROM email_templates WHERE email_key = 'MANUAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED'

INSERT INTO email_templates_data (email_key, locale, assoc_id, subject, body, assoc_type) SELECT 'PAYPAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED', locale, assoc_id, subject, body, assoc_type FROM email_templates_data WHERE email_key = 'MANUAL_PAYMENT_RECEIVED'
